> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **santa hat washcloth** this santa hat crochet washcloth is a fun and festive way to bring holiday cheer to your kitchen this pattern uses the intarsia crochet technique combined with the wide half-double_crochet stitch wide half_double_crochet for clean bold colorwork that really makes the santa hat pop if you re new to intarsia don t worry - as the pattern includes step-by-step photos and written instructions the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth 117yds / 107m * approx 72yds / 66m for dark gray 15yds / 14m for white and 30yds / 27m for bordeaux * * tea towel 457yds / 434m * approx 430yds / 393m for dark gray 15yds / 14m for white and 30yds / 27m for bordeaux * *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton aran 6 **hook ** 4 5mm g-7 crochet hook 7 --- **join my newsletter **
